main event: A flying object was sighted traveling parallel to the horizon at dusk in Puyallup, Washington on July 27, 1949.
interesting points: The object appeared as a long streak of light for a few seconds.,It appeared to explode or accelerate during the sighting.,There were no other confirmed witnesses except possibly passengers from a low-flying airliner.,The weather was clear with some visible stars, but there were cloud banks close to the horizon.,The object's distance was estimated to be around twenty miles away from the observer.
witness description: no confirmed witnesses except possibly airliner passengers
